simasahitha piliyandala bokundara wiwidha sewa samupakara samithiya bokundara pihiti ema samupakara bhumiye idikara thibu miris ambaarumhala me wanawita ema sthanayen iwath kara atha.me nisa bokundara thunbowila jaliyagoda niwanthidiya makuluduwa, dulammahara kaliyammahara dahaya kanuwa katuwawala werahara aadi pradesha rasaka paribhogika janathawa dadi asiruwata pathwa sitithi.bokundara aarthika madhyasthanaya idikirima sandaha me miris ambaarumhala iwath kirimata sidu wu bawa samupakara baladharihu pawasathi.miris ambaarumhala nawatha idikarana bawa kiya masa gananawak gathawi athath eya methek itu nowu bawath ehi thibu galawa iwath karana lada yanthra siyallada me wanawita dirapath wimata idahara athi bawath pradeshawasihu pawasathi.bokundara ha ee awata pradesha rasaka paribhogika janathawata itha prayojanawath wu ema miris ambaarumhala nawatha idikirimata piyawara noganne mandayi owhu adala baladharingen wimasathi.
gad eka panala mawa beranawa..
obata mage namaskaraya...
